mapper.select: SELECT A.ORDER_NO, B.S_IMG1, B.S_NAME, C.CODENAME AS PAYMENT_METHOD, A.PAYMENT_PRICE, TO_CHAR(A.ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ORDER_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.CHECK_IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECK_IN_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.CHECK_OUT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECK_OUT_DATE FROM THISORDER A LEFT JOIN TMSTSTAY B ON A.S_NO = B.S_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTCODE C ON C.GRPCODE = 8 AND A.PAYMENT_METHOD = C.CODE LEFT JOIN TMSTMEMBER D ON A.M_NO = D.M_NO WHERE ( #{param1} = 2 AND D.M_NAME LIKE '%' || #{param2} || '%' ) OR ( #{param1} = 3 AND D.M_EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{param2} || '%' ) OR ( #{param1} = 4 AND D.M_NO LIKE '%' || #{param2} || '%' )
